item.title: Chilli lemon butter shrimp
item.description: Prepare the shrimp: If not already done, wash, peel, and devein the shrimp. Cook the aromatics: In a pan over medium heat, add the butter and olive oil. Once hot, add the garlic, diced red onion, and chilli. Saut√© for about 2 minutes until fragrant. Add seasoning and lemon: Stir in the smoked paprika and chilli & lemon seasoning. Cook for another 2 minutes. Add the lemon zest and juice and mix well.
